_DownloadShipmentText2_: 1. Click DOWNLOAD SHIPMENT button for RFQ shipment template.
_DownloadShipmentText3_: 2. Fill in the downloaded shipment with the required information.
_DownloadShipmentText4_: 3. Verify your shipment in the file.
_DownloadShipmentText5_: 4. Upload the shipment from the below section.
_UploadShipmentText2_: 1. Upload the shipment from here by selecting your file.
_UploadShipmentText3_: 2. Click on UPLOAD SHIPMENT and wait for the Success message. This will confirm that your shipment has been submitted.
